text: Raetihi is a small town in the Ruapehu District, New Zealand. It is situated on the junction of State Highway 4 and State Highway 49. It is 9 kilometers west of Ohakune and 88 kilometers northwest of Whanganui. It has a primary school located in the township. == References == Category:Towns in Horizons Category:Ruapehu District
title: Raetihi
